synopsis.text:
An enigmatic adolescent boy, untouched by the passage of time, leaves an indelible mark on the lives of various individuals, each recalling their encounters with him during their youth. This captivating tale weaves together the diverse narratives of these individuals, spanning different ages, as they recount the profound impact this ageless teenager had on their lives.

In the bustling world of high school kickboxing, Oriya Rouma, a seemingly lackadaisical club member, finds himself entangled in a whirlwind of chaos. From sustaining injuries in brawls to facing the wrath of his exasperated best friend, Tamaki, who also happens to be a fellow club member, Rouma's life is anything but ordinary. The arrival of a cryptic new student further stirs the pot, as both students and teachers alike harbor inexplicable memories of this stranger.

This intriguing young man, blessed with inexplicable powers transcending time and space, embarks on a journey, altering the trajectories of the women he encounters. Each woman, touched by his presence, endeavors to preserve their unique memories of him. As we delve deeper into his extraordinary journey, what remarkable experiences and encounters await him?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
